General.Name: Pacific Textiles Holdings Limited
General.Description: Pacific Textiles Holdings Limited manufactures and trades in textile products. It is involved in the knitting, dyeing, printing, and finishing of fabrics. The company's fabrics are used in a range of garments, which includes men's, women's, and children's clothing, as well as sportswear, swimwear, and inner wears. In addition, it offers information technology services. The company operates in Hong Kong, Vietnam, the People's Republic of China, Bangladesh, Indonesia, Sri Lanka, Cambodia, the United States, Jordan, Africa, India, rest of Asia, and internationally. Pacific Textiles Holdings Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Kwai Chung, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Eastern Sea Industrial Building, Kwai Chung, Hong Kong
